type: Tutorial Step - What is a Contribution?

definition.text: The project will succeed if it manages to foster global collaboration. We welcome contributions of all sorts so that everyone may give back!

paragraphs.text: In short, everything that adds value is good!
Fixing a typo, a dead link, and improving the Docs.
Translating a page into your native language.
Designing icons, working to improve the UX/UI.
Producing content as in-app tutorials or videos.
Blogging about Superalgos and spreading the word.
Sharing a Data Mine or a Trading System!
Testing, removing bugs, integrating crypto-projects, and contributing to the Code Base.
